ygData.subject: Re: word of possession
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope, Christie. Face it, you went way overboard. Happy99 has been found just about everywhere. Let s get back on subject now, gee thank you. ... From: Cristie
ygData.messageBody:
Nope, Christie. Face it, you went way overboard. Happy99 has been found just
about everywhere.
Let's get back on subject now, gee thank you.
-----Original Message-----
From: Cristie <cristie@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, May 16, 1999 11:57 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] word of possession


>From: Cristie <cristie@...>
>
>YOU, Mr. Kubin, being the parent, are still responsible for what your kids
>do with your Internet connection. You need to run virus software on your
>system and these things would not be passed along to others, unwitting on
>your/your kids part or not. Enough said.
>
>
>
>At 11:40 PM 5/16/99 -0400, you wrote:
>>From: Richard Kubin <rkubin@...>
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
>http://www.onelist.com
>At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
Please keep the emails on topic.
